column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My non-gluten free friends loved their regular pizza as well! Definitely lived up to these reviews. When we put our name in
column2: they told us it would be an hour wait. We put our name in and then proceeded to order our pizza. When we sat down
column3: our pizza arrived in 10 min. It was great timing and awesome that they have that option to speed up the process. I recommend doing that if there is a long wait!
